# subtitleVisibility

**Instance Property**

The visibility of the subtitle text rendered beneath the marker balloon.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitleVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility { get set }
```

## Discussion

MapKit shows the text when the user selects a marker.

## Setting the Visibility

- **titleVisibility**: The visibility of the title text rendered beneath the marker balloon.
- **MKFeatureVisibility**: Constants that indicate the visibility of different map features.
